availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Simon Livingston (Louisville KY, spectacle salesman, peddler)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, spectacle salesman. Native of Prussia. Married to Jane Livingston in 1858. Father of Louis Livingston, Sarah Livingston, and Joseph Livingston. Spectacle salesman in Louisville in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, page 466A.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cook County, Chicago Ward 4, Enumeration District 103, p. 2.
KYR-0001-004-1388.
